ygData.subject: Re: Speaking of +charisma items
ygData.msgSnippet: i believe you have to make a trip north to attain what is needed for the cap, i don t want to give too much away but try hunting some polar bears... you of
ygData.messageBody:
i believe you have to make a trip north to attain what is needed for
the cap, i don't want to give too much away but try hunting some polar
bears...

you of course, must be in good standing with the leatherfoots to even
be offered the cap. try joining their ranks...

have fun!

Azeru
17th Monk, Povar

mikejj@... wrote:
>
> From: mikejj@...
>
> Has anyone gotten a Leatherfoot Raiders Cap,
> I read on eq'lizer that it gives +10 charisma.
>
> Does it start in Rivervale with the Marshal
> who is the head of the Leatherfoot Raiders,
> because I can't seem to start this quest. He's
> the one in the alcove to the right of the
> Sheriff. Even if it doesn't start there does
> someone know the *exact* words to use to answer
> him?
>
> Or is the cap a loot item from the halfling
> bandit camp in Nektulos?
>
> mike
